fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data.hbase.store

Class DirectWriteHBaseStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data.store.AbstractPersistentStore
      • fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data.store.AbstractDirectWriteStore<HBasePersistenceBackend>
        • fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data.hbase.store.DirectWriteHBaseStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectWriteStore, PersistentStore, InternalEObject.EStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadOnlyHBaseStore

    public class DirectWriteHBaseStore
extends AbstractDirectWriteStore<HBasePersistenceBackend>
    An AbstractDirectWriteStore that translates model-level operations to HBase operations.

    This class implements the PersistentStore interface that defines a set of operations to implement in order to allow EMF persistence delegation. If this store is used, every method call and property access on PersistentEObject is forwarded to this class, that takes care of the serialization/deserialization from/to HBase.

    See Also:
    PersistentEObject, HBasePersistenceBackend, AbstractDirectWriteStore
    Note:
    For historical purposes this class does not use a HBasePersistenceBackend, instead, it accesses HBase directly using the low-level database API.

    This store can be used as a base store that can be complemented by plugging decorator stores on top of it (see AbstractPersistentStoreDecorator subclasses) to provide additional features such as caching or logging.
